UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Stepwise identification of potent antimicrobial peptides from human genome.
Literature.Author: Yan L, Yan Y, Liu H, Lv Q

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human myoblasts:13% Inhibition=10 µg/ml,Human myoblasts:16% Inhibition=50 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=<=15µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=<=25µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=<=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=<=10µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 35152(MIC=<=20µg/ml)
